section.name: The Who is Who in OpenUSS
section.p:
These are the people, who made this project possible.
Please look at our team list page to see the developer, who help us making this project successful!

td.p: As the chairman of the Intitute of Business Informatics and Controlling at the University of Muenster, his main research area is Controlling and CAL+CAT (Computer Assisted Learning, Computer Assisted Teaching).
Please refer to his detail page for further information.

Frank Bensberg is working as assistant researcher at the Institute of Business Informatics at the Westfaelische Wilhelms-University (Muenster).
His research interest concentrates on Data Mining, Web Mining and CAL+CAT (Computer Assisted Learning, Computer Assisted Teaching). His doctor thesis deals with Web Log Mining in internet-based markets.
Please refer to his detail page for further information.

His experience in programming began 15 years ago with Basic for IBM Compatible PC/XT. After he finished his study at Business Informatics Institute at the University of Muenster, he is working as assistant researcher at the Intitute of Prof. Dr. H. L. Grob.
In his spare time he writes articles for German Java Magazin, Der Entwickler and Linux Enterprise.
Please refer to his detail page for further information.
